title: NCOC, RTA, along with Motorway Police check vaccination compliance at M-1
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 30 (APP):National Command and Operation Center (NCOC) team along with Secretary Regional Transport Authority (RTA) Rawalpindi on Thursday checked the coronavirus vaccination status of drivers and passengers at Motorway (M-1) Toll Plaza Islamabad.
The teams along with Motorway Police checked the vaccination status of drivers and passengers on public transport of various routes at Peshawar Motorway (M-1) Toll Plaza Islamabad.
The Mobile Vaccination teams injected the vaccine doses to the non-vaccinated passengers and drivers on the spot.
